meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>car</kanji> <kanji>manipulat</kanji>or is someone who manipulates the car. This 車 riffs off of 電車, which is a train, making the train manipulator a <vocabulary>train conductor</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
